nodes.text: Arviz Linden was a male who ran a hyperbaride plant on Marca by Dynamic Synergetics, Inc. Linden used the droid M-3PO-C as his secretary. Linden kept the plant's production at a minimum to protect the native Sekct, and M-3PO-C admired him for that. M-3PO-C was dismayed after learning of Linden's death of a mysteriously ruptured trachea.
